value.name: State Police, Greene Co. DA announce arrests in drug trafficking investigation
value.description: The New York State Police and the Greene County District Attorney’s Office today announced the arrest of four Greene County residents and one subject from Watervliet, NY, who were operating a large-scale narcotics operation in Greene County.
